name: TheSteakLovers'Companion
0:
”Alexa open the steak lovers companion”
”Alexa, ask the steak lovers companion to start cooking”
”Alexa, ask the steak lovers companion to grill some steaks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the steak lovers companion
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Steak Lovers' Companion from Omaha Steaks is a guide with timers for grilling or pan-searing your steaks. The skill welcomes the user, asks a few questions (what cut, how thick, how they like their steak, grilling, searing, etc.), and then suggests the right timers to set.
The user confirms which timers to set, and when. When the timer sounds, the skill will prompt the user to take the next action and/or check on status.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
